com.netflix.iceberg

Interface Filterable<T extends Filterable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Java class returned by filter methods, also filterable
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<DataFile>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Snapshot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilteredManifest, FilteredSnapshot, ManifestReader

    public interface Filterable<T extends Filterable<T>>
extends java.lang.Iterable<DataFile>
    Methods to filter files in a snapshot or manifest when reading.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> ALL_COLUMNS

    • Field Detail

      • ALL_COLUMNS

        static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> ALL_COLUMNS

    • Method Detail

      • select

        default T select(java.lang.String... columns)
        Selects the columns of a file manifest to read.

        If columns are set multiple times, the last set of columns will be read.

        If the Filterable object has partition filters, they will be added to the returned partial.

        For a list of column names, see the table format specification.

        Parameters:
        columns - String column names to load from the manifest file
        Returns:
        a Filterable that will load only the given columns

      • select

        T select(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> columns)
        Selects the columns of a file manifest to read.

        If columns are set multiple times, the last set of columns will be read.

        If the Filterable object has partition filters, they will be added to the returned partial.

        For a list of column names, see the table format specification.

        Parameters:
        columns - String column names to load from the manifest file
        Returns:
        a Filterable that will load only the given columns

      • filterPartitions

        T filterPartitions(Expression expr)
        Adds a filter expression on partition data for matching files.

        If the Filterable object already has partition filters, the new filter will be added as an additional requirement. The result filter expression will be the result of expr and any existing filters.

        If the Filterable object has columns selected, they will be added to the returned partial.

        Parameters:
        expr - An expression for filtering this Filterable using partition data
        Returns:
        a Filterable that will load only rows that match expr

      • filterRows

        T filterRows(Expression expr)
        Adds a filter expression on data rows for matching files.

        Expressions passed to this function will be converted to partition expressions before they are used to filter data files.

        If the Filterable object already has partition filters, the new filter will be added as an additional requirement. The result filter expression will be the result of expr and any existing filters.

        If the Filterable object has columns selected, they will be added to the returned partial.

        Parameters:
        expr - An expression for filtering this Filterable using row data
        Returns:
        a Filterable that will load only rows that match expr
